title: ChefBot
description: Full-stack AI recipe generator with React, Node.js/Express, and Claude AI. Features user authentication, social recipe sharing, and real-time updates. Successfully migrated from Firebase (NoSQL) to Supabase (PostgreSQL), architecting a complete relational schema with Row Level Security policies from scratch.

title: SyncUp
description: A mentorship and collaboration platform connecting i.c.stars interns and alumni through projects and feedback.

title: D.A.S.H (United Airlines)
description: Enterprise-grade AI-powered customer analytics platform for United Airlines executives and analysts. Features role-based access control, real-time sentiment analysis, NPS tracking, and Claude AI-generated insights. Built by Team Metis during i.c.stars Cycle 58 in collaboration with United Airlines mentors.

title: Security Buddy
description: Privacy-focused companion app that helps users understand and improve their digital security posture through friendly AI guidance.
